title: The First Game Hype Is Real
description:
Welcome back to In The Crease! Linda and Emily dive into their experiences on opening night, what they're most looking forward to as teams play their first games, and Emily even teaches us a new language...
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
itunes:subtitle: Linda and Emily recap the first night of NHL games and what they're most excited about for this season.
